20110121150434.000|20110121150436.000|CC1|FORCE BASE FOR A 2 HOUR 15

20110121150455.000|20110121150457.000|CC1|HOSPITAL IS THE SAME PLACE      
20110121150457.000|20110121150459.000|CC1|BUFFALO BILLS TIGHT END KEVIN   
20110121150459.000|20110121150501.000|CC1|EVERETT WAS TREATED AFTER THIS
